description: Opposition activist Maria Kolesnikova says she feared for her life during an attempt to deport her.
title: Belarus opposition politician told she would be deported 'alive or in bits'
title_page: Belarus opposition politician told she would be deported 'alive or in bits' - BBC News
maintext: "It was stated that if I did not voluntarily leave the Republic of Belarus, I would be taken out anyway, alive or in bits. There were also threats to imprison me for up to 25 years."
